Paragraph: After pretreatment with 3 mg of cyproheptadine , 2 mg mianserin , or 2 mg chlorpheniramine , only 5 of 105 animals ( 5 % ) died after receiving BSA on day + 7 ( p less than 0 . 001 ) .

| --- |
| BSA |

In this paragraph, "BSA" is the only disease entity mentioned. It is an abbreviation for "Bovine Serum Albumin," which is a protein derived from cow's blood serum.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".
